dmca.title: Mettler-Toledo, Inc.
dmca.body:
Corporate Disparagement

... Furthermore, you have disparaged our client by your libelous comments about certain Mettler products at some of your web sites. Do you not consider it untruthful and disingenuous to promote Mettler products at some of your sites and disparage them at other of your sites? Your comments have crossed the line from opinion to untruths and cannot be tolerated. You must immediately change your sites to delete negative and false references to our client's products.
